fafce015-d3a8-48cd-876f-e68e64dde28c.title: iOS 14 crash bug
fafce015-d3a8-48cd-876f-e68e64dde28c.text:
Some iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.6 users are experiencing an issue that makes the app crash while launching. If you need to use the app right away, please update it to iOS 15.

I'm currently trying to figure out exactly what's going on, so if you want to stick to iOS 14, please wait for the new fixed version.

6b83362c-b407-45a0-b1e6-e073a7d6e062.title: What I'm working on
6b83362c-b407-45a0-b1e6-e073a7d6e062.text: I'm currently working on adding new pools and coins to the app. The next version should come with Hiveon support, but don't worry, many more are coming after that! Alephium miners and Nanopool users will soon get full support from Hashrate as well!

146a019f-33f7-4b3b-8a1a-f1055e6e20eb.title: What's new in version 1.3.2
146a019f-33f7-4b3b-8a1a-f1055e6e20eb.text:
Some bugs were fixed:
• Fixed a performance issue on macOS
• Fixed some issues with the calculator
